title: Yates Flew, They Froze: Del Toro, Carapaz Search for Answers after Giro d’Italia Oblivion
content:
Yates celebrates a spectacular GC revival Sunday in Rome, Del Toro and Carapaz scrape for answers in the ashes of their own disappointment: 'I gave everything I had.'

Read the full article at Yates Flew, They Froze: Del Toro, Carapaz Search for Answers after Giro d’Italia Oblivion on Velo.
author: ahood
